name: Reclaiming Xephera
description:
This is super pre-alpha content. We're just putting it out there so people can try it and see how they like it while we develop the game. The development is super slow as we're a very small group and we are all in school full-time and/or work.

This is a turn-based RPG game with a class system, skill learning, crafting and deconstruction and more.

A better description of the game's content will follow soon.
